com.github.pyknic.bigarray

Interface ShortImmutableArray.Builder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShortImmutableArrayBuilder
    Enclosing interface:
    ShortImmutableArray

    public static interface ShortImmutableArray.Builder
    A builder for a ShortImmutableArray. The builder can be appended with values using the append(short)-method until it is finalized using the build()-method. The backing implementation will be decided once the array is built.

    The implementation of Builder is intended to handle a very large amount of shorts as well as a very small amount.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ShortImmutableArray.Builder append(short value)
      Append an value to the builder.
      ShortImmutableArray build()
      Builds the array.

    • Method Detail

      • append

        ShortImmutableArray.Builder append(short value)
        Append an value to the builder.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to append
        Returns:
        a reference to this builder

      • build

        ShortImmutableArray build()
        Builds the array. After this method has been called, the builder should be discarded. The returned array is immutable.
        Returns:
        the built array
